object.name: convertGiftToStars
object.description: Converts a given regular gift to Telegram Stars. Requires the can_convert_gifts_to_stars business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Converts a given regular gift to Telegram Stars. Requires the can_convert_gifts_to_stars business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Converts a given regular gift to Telegram Stars. Requires the *can_convert_gifts_to_stars* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the regular gift that should be converted to Telegram Stars
annotations.name: owned_gift_id
